The ending pieces so many things together, mind blown! Just amazing storytelling and awesome gameplay throughout the entire game. Must play!!

I've done horrible things in my youth.
What a unspeakable sins.
All i want is a peace on my mind, so that the screaming would stop.
But life continue on, so was the screaming.
So i drawn myself in spirit and bad wager.
And now i'm in deep mess, and lost everything.
Lost my Little Angel
Then i was offered a second chance, a redemption, for all my sins.
I'll do anything to make to make amends to stop this nightmare.
Even if it's just a little.

The game mechanics is a bit annoying and some parts of the game are very on the nose, but the overall presentation and story are excellent and enticing. I wish they'd have worked out the kinks with the gameplay, but I guess you can't have everything. Overall it's a very enjoyable game, and I totally did not catch the twist coming at the end. Really nice.

Fantastic game! A simple shooter in a old fashioned yet mystical setting, but the storyline is really compelling. Whatever genre of games you like, you definitely need to try this one. It's one for the ages!

Bioshock is one of my favorite series of all time.  Infinite will not disappoint.  The story is not as good as the first Bioshock, and IMHO the mechanics of Bioshock 2 are the best in the series, but Infinite is still great and does the series justice.  A classic and a must play.

Plus the DLC lets you go back to Rapture, which is awesome.  The DLC might not be as good as the stand alone Bioshock Infinite but just the fact that you get to go back to Rapture with Infinite's graphics is absolutely awesome. Again a must own.
